title: Women's Tops and Bottoms
textBeforeTable: Craft Size chart 30 days Manufacturer Warranty: training, racing, cool weather cycling Recommended Use: underarm mesh vents Venting: no Hood: polyamide, polyester Material: Tech Specs Mesh underarm vents help keep your core temperature regulated during heavy exertion Morning rides don't always start off on the cheeriest terms. So pull on the Craft PB Featherlight Jacket, and stay protected from those early winds or a light drizzle. And should the sun decide to make an appearance before the end of your ride, the Featherlight lives up to its name, easily packing into itself and sliding into your jersey pocket. Description Item # CRA0412 Craft  PB Featherlight Jacket - Women's
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg. Sleeve: Measure from your neck to your wrist with arms held out.
